entry.title: 'cause being your punchline still is something
entry.summary:
Author: whiry

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,345Chapters: 14/21Kudos: 182

Summary: Born into a world of the supernatural and forced to segregate himself and his human peers from the supernatural creatures that inhabit Beacon Hills, Stiles grew up with the belief that integration was the key to a better life, thanks to his mother‚Äôs social work. Of course, that belief is only furthered by the mate mark he bears of his mate‚Äôs first words to him, something only supernatural creatures and their occasional human mates are supposed to have. Desperate to find his mate and carry on his mother‚Äôs work after her death, Stiles does everything in his power to unite his town, even if that means enduring dinners with Derek Hale, who hates him and refuses to speak to him. After a terse interaction, Derek finally speaks and the two realize they‚Äôre mates. Well, surely Stiles can still get his happy ending. Right?

Author: dd0g90

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 291Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 6

Summary: " Cuffing Season" - The time of year between Halloween and, Valentines Day where adults form a couple to get through the lonely holiday season. Most break up February 15th. Stiles is in his last year of college. He recently lost his job as a waiter at a restaurant and,is barely making ends meat as a delivery driver. He's already delayed his education enough paying for a class at a time. When Lydia suggests an app" Cuffing Season" where rich people pay you to date them during the holidays.Stiles is all ears. What happens when he finds out the three men he is dating are related and, invite him to the same holiday party?

entry.title: Dying In Love
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,614Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 38

Summary: After dropping out of his FBI internship, Stiles returned to Beacon Hills, struggling to outgrow the version of himself high school forced him to become. He wasn't sure what he was doing with his life, but he kept busy among the shelves at The Reading Nook, letting the quiet and routine distract him from the memories. And then Derek Hale walked in. Derek being in his life again stirred a hunger inside Stiles, a wanting that consumed him whole. entry.title: The Weight of Wings
entry.summary:
Author: QueenRumi21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,212Chapters: 2/16Kudos: 68

Summary: Stiles Stilinski thought turning eighteen would mean college applications, sleepless nights, and maybe finally admitting he had a crush on one very broody Alpha werewolf. He did not expect wings. Overnight, Stiles learns the truth his father has kept hidden his whole life: he isn‚Äôt human. He‚Äôs a Nephilim‚Äîhalf-angel, half-human, dangerously powerful, and growing stronger by the day. With a pair of pure white wings and abilities he can‚Äôt control, Stiles is forced to confront a past he never knew existed‚Ä¶ and a destiny he never asked for. As the pack scrambles to understand what Stiles is becoming, Derek Hale feels something inside him stir‚Äîsomething ancient, instinctive, impossible to ignore. A connection he can‚Äôt explain.
